long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is intended for use with Dealer.Com's instance of SalesForce. The tool will dynamically highlight case priority, age, and status.

At this time, SaleForce does not allow users to change colors of specific columns of data, which can make staying organized more difficult. This extension aims to solve for this.

This extension uses JavaScript to pull specific page data from console SalesForce view and applies CSS based on the value. The user can choose to apply styling to case Priority, Age, and/or Status using the extension popup.

This tool is only intended to function on the Cases page.

Update 1.3 introduces an Accessibility Mode which aims to offer a more accessible color pallet.
